com.bbn.openmap.gui
Class ZoomPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

                  com.bbn.openmap.gui.OMComponentPanel
                      com.bbn.openmap.gui.OMToolComponent
                          com.bbn.openmap.gui.ZoomPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tool, LightMapHandlerChild, PropertyConsumer, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextChild, java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextMembershipListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ZoomPanel
extends OMToolComponent
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable

Bean to zoom the Map.

This bean is a source for ZoomEvents. It is a simple widget with a ZoomIn button and a ZoomOut button. When a button is pressed, the appropriate zoom event is fired to all registered listeners.

See Also:
addZoomListener(com.bbn.openmap.event.ZoomListener), Serialized Form

Method Detail

getZoomInFactor

public float getZoomInFactor()
Get the Zoom In Factor.

Returns:
float the degree by which map scale will be multiplied when zoom in button is pressed

setZoomInFactor

public void setZoomInFactor(float factor)
Sets the Zoom In factor. The factor must be < 1.0. (otherwise it would make ZoomIn into a ZoomOut).

Parameters:
factor - the degree by which map scale should be multiplied

getZoomOutFactor

public float getZoomOutFactor()
Get the Zoom Out Factor.

Returns:
float the degree by which map scale will be multiplied when zoom out button is pressed

setZoomOutFactor

public void setZoomOutFactor(float factor)
Sets the Zoom Out Factor. The factor must be > 1.0 (otherwise it would turn ZoomOut into ZoomIn).

Parameters:
factor - the degree by which map scale should be multiplied.

protected javax.swing.JButton getButton(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String info,
                                        java.lang.String command)
Add the named button to the panel.

Parameters:
name - GIF image name
info - ToolTip text
command - String command name

listener - The ZoomListener to be added
